description: They blended OluKai comfort with island craftsmanship to create the dapper Lae‘ahi Lauhala. Made with antiqued and burnished leather that's been hand-woven into a traditional lauhala mat design, it'll class up any outfit. They use natural, high-character leathers. Hues and color tones can vary slightly from pair to pair.
name: Olukai LaeAhi Lauhala - Mens
